channel.title: How Do You Install Server Clients? HELP!
channel.description:
Dear Forum, I've been trying to install some clients and because they have no auto-installer it has been really difficult. I have used Win-rar and win zip but I don't know where to unzip them to. I have java and moparscape do I unzip them into there? :confused:
Please help and I will be grateful Arrowdude181

item.title: How Do You Install Server Clients? HELP!
item.dc:creator: @public_boolean public boolean
item.description:
@public_boolean wrote:

Ok, once you have donwloaded the file it would be in a .rar or .zip format, Open that file and highlight everything inside the folder apart for the folder called (…), once highlighted, go to extraction and chose a path where you wish the files to be extracted to.

for more details to set a RuneScape Private server please vist here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

if you wish to have more help, dont hesitate to Private message me

~Public boolean

Read full topic
